General.Name: AIS Resources Ltd
General.Description: A.I.S. Resources Limited is a venture capital firm specializes in early stage and growth capital investments. The firm prefers to invest in mining and minerals trading; battery materials like lithium, manganese, nickel, and gold; internet of things; and information technology sectors. It seeks to invest globally but focuses on British Columbia in Canada, Australia, and Latin America. The firm does private placements with four months holding period by issuing new shares. A.I.S. Resources Limited was founded in 1967 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1120 ? 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
